para.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:
"Attorney General" means the Attorney General for the District of Columbia
"Court" means the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.
"Judicial officer" means the Chief Judge, a Senior Judge, an Associate Judge, or a Magistrate Judge of the court.
"Minor" means a person under 18 years of age.
"Petitioner" means the person for whom an anti-stalking order is sought under this chapter.
"Respondent" means any person against whom a petition for an anti-stalking order is filed under this chapter.
"Stalked" means any course of conduct prohibited by § 22-3133.
